div.p: N78/921, unit 987, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the month
Month over Quarter struck through.
ending 31st January 18 78

pounds ten shillings and —— pen
